title: Arugula With Hearts Of Palm, Grapefruit And Oil-cured Olives
summary: Arugula With Hearts Of Palm, Grapefruit And Oil-cured Olives is a caveman, gluten free, primal, and fodmap friendly side dish. This recipe serves 4. For $1.42 per serving, this recipe covers 14% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One portion of this dish contains roughly 3g of protein, 15g of fat, and a total of 218 calories. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. Head to the store and pick up olive oil, champagne vinegar, flat-leaf parsley leaves, and a few other things to make it today. With a spoonacular score of 73%, this dish is good.
